titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning farthing tokens.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon. Publication date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Dated at end: VVhitehall the first day of March, in the eleuenth yeere of our reigne. ...
Arms 24; Steele notation: Our notwithstanding 2) inconueniences, commandment.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
